input.sentences: living out here | having a truck was a necessity .
houses were surrounded by acres of land .
the neighbors to the left built a second house on their land in hopes another family would move closer .
our closest neighbors were about five minutes away .
and the neighbors behind our home were tucked away neatly near the edge of the woods .
output.sentences: It was the perfect day yesterday for a walk.
The yardwork was done and the day was free
Except the barn, I had to feed the pigs.
I also had to take grandma some breakfast.
Then head over to my friends house.
